title: Happy Gilmore
short_plot_summary: A rejected hockey player leans on his powerful swing to dominate the game of golf, with the ultimate goal of saving his grandmother's house from being foreclosed.
explanation: A hockey stick, representing Happy's background as a hockey player
A golf flag, symbolizing the sport that Happy transitions to
An angry face, reflecting Happy's short temper on and off the golf course
A money-mouth face, representing Happy's goal to win money to save his grandma's house
A trophy, signifying the golf championship competition Happy must win
